Package utb.fai.natt.spi

Class NATTKeyword

java.lang.Object
utb.fai.natt.spi.NATTKeyword
public abstract class NATTKeyword extends Object
Abstract class for a keyword. It ensures easy construction of a test structure that can also be easily executed. Each keyword contains its name and a map of parameters. How each parameter is used depends on the class that inherits from this abstract class.

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT_PARAMETER_NAME

      public static final String DEFAULT_PARAMETER_NAME
      This is the parameter name that a keyword gets when it contains a single unnamed value. For example, in YAML it would be something like -> keyword_name: "this is parameter value"
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

      public NATTKeyword()
      Abstract NATT keyword class.
      Parameters:
      keywordName - Name of the keyword.
      paramNames - List of all parameter names that this keyword takes.

    • putParameter

      public void putParameter(String name, NATTKeyword.ParameterValue value)
      Adds a parameter to the keyword.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the parameter (case insensitive).
      value - Any value of the parameter.

    • isIgnored

      public boolean isIgnored()
      Checks whether the keyword is ignored or not. If it is ignored, it will not be executed during testing. Ignoring can be set for any keyword with the flag "ignore: true".
      Returns:
      true if the keyword is ignored, false otherwise.

    • getParameterValue

      public NATTKeyword.ParameterValue getParameterValue(String[] names, NATTKeyword.ParamValType type, boolean required) throws InvalidSyntaxInConfigurationException
      Returns the value of the keyword's parameter with RAW loaded values. This is a safe method. Placeholder symbols for variables are replaced with their values (only in String).
      Parameters:
      names - Name of the requested parameter. The parameter may have multiple names. The value of the first found parameter is used.
      type - Expected type of the parameter. It is validated during loading and must match.
      required - True if the value of this parameter is required. If false, the function may return null and the parameter type will be marked as null, but no exception will be thrown.
      Returns:
      Value of the parameter.
      Throws:
      InvalidSyntaxInConfigurationException - if the parameter is missing or has an invalid type.

    • getParameterValue

      public NATTKeyword.ParameterValue getParameterValue(String name, NATTKeyword.ParamValType type, boolean required) throws InvalidSyntaxInConfigurationException
      Returns the value of the keyword's parameter with RAW loaded values. This is a safe method. Placeholder symbols for variables are replaced with their values (only in String).
      Parameters:
      names - Name of the requested parameter.
      type - Expected type of the parameter. It is validated during loading and must match.
      required - True if the value of this parameter is required. If false, the function may return null and the parameter type will be marked as null, but no exception will be thrown.
      Returns:
      Value of the parameter.
      Throws:
      InvalidSyntaxInConfigurationException - if the parameter is missing or has an invalid type.

    • printToStructure

      public void printToStructure(int offset)
      Debug function to print the structure of the keyword to the standard stream.
      Parameters:
      offset - Offset for printing (number of spaces before the printout).

    • init

      public abstract void init(INATTContext ctx) throws InvalidSyntaxInConfigurationException
      In this method, the initialization of the keyword will be performed. The initialization method is called only after its construction, i.e., after calling the "build()" method.
      Throws:
      InvalidSyntaxInConfigurationException - if initialization fails due to invalid syntax.

    • execute

      public abstract boolean execute(INATTContext ctx) throws InternalErrorException, NonUniqueModuleNamesException
      In this method, the code that the keyword should execute will be defined.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the execution of the keyword was successful. For the test case to be completely successful, all its actions must be successful, meaning they must all return true.
      Throws:
      InternalErrorException - if an internal error occurs during execution.
      NonUniqueModuleNamesException - if module names are not unique.

    • deleteAction

      public abstract void deleteAction(INATTContext ctx) throws InternalErrorException
      This is an action that will be called at the end of the "lifecycle" of the keyword. That is, when it can no longer be used in the context in which it was created due to the end of that context. The method should contain actions that end any internally started modules or perform cleanup actions.
      Throws:
      InternalErrorException - if an internal error occurs during cleanup.

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Returns a description of the keyword. Its name and parameters and status messages (success, error, etc.).
      Returns:
      Description of the keyword.

    • getDocumentation

      public NATTKeyword.KeywordDocumentation getDocumentation()
      Returns documentation for the keyword. Returns null if the keyword does not have any documentation.
